categories.title: Features
list: Added new Bridge Edge Loops action

categories.title: Changes
list: Scatter: Scattered elements more accurately follow surface rotation
Expand/Shrink Selection: Extend functionality in face and edge selection modes
Text Mesh: Support loading OpenType font files
XYZ Surface Generator: Include variables as sliders

list: Scatter: Fixed issue with undoing group creation
Bridge Edge Loops: Fix issue with choosing best followup twist offset

list: Text Mesh: Fixed issue where fonts wouldn't load
